effects.display_string: Set: When your bleeds deal damage, they have a chance to grant you Vile Tincture for 8 sec, increasing your poison damage by 1.0% per stack (up to 5 stacks).
Set: While you have 5 or more stacks of Vile Tincture, Garrote, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest deal 10% additional damage.

name: Writhing Ringworm
description: Is it alive? Maybe. Is it fashionable? ...Maybe.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Agility. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 97,132 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,502 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 171 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
